content: this square uses my standard 26x26 window interlocking crochet format however previously used a shorter version of the pattern as you can see in some of the photos i have made changes to match the format of my other patterns this pattern is written for interlocking crochet however also includes an untested c2c chart and instructions as well as an untested mosaic crochet chart there are instructions on how to do interlocking crochet however you will need prior knowledge of c2c or mosaic crochet if you decide to do those methods **this square is the same size as my other pattern squares unless otherwise noted**
